sentences.sentence: In fact, each bioreactor hosted its own distinct mix of microorganisms;
sentences.translation: 事实上，每台生物反应器都宿居着具有鲜明特色的微生物种群；

sentences.sentence: This is the homepage of the State Key Laboratory of Bioreactor Engineering.
sentences.translation: 这是生物反应器工程国家重点实验室的网页。

sentences.sentence: 145 of the bacteria were so unique they could be used to predict which bioreactor the bacterial sample came from.
sentences.translation: 其中的145种菌类可以辨别出他们分别取样于哪些生物质反应器。
